meanings.definition: The act of sewing with a needle and thread.
meanings.sent1: Her stitching on the dress was neat and precise.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her stitching by making a small pouch.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to help with the stitching, but ended up tangled in the thread.
meanings.sent4: The stitching of friendships between the group members was strong and lasting.
meanings.sent5: The stitching on the flag fluttered proudly in the wind.

meanings.definition: A line of stitches or sewing.
meanings.sent1: The stitching on the quilt held memories of generations.
meanings.sent2: He admired the intricate stitching on the leather bag.
meanings.sent3: The stitching on the baseball was so perfect, it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The stitching of the bookbinding kept the pages secure.
meanings.sent5: The stitching on the map marked the path through the forest.
